rules_text:
Yune, Attuned to The Medallion enters tapped.
[i]Locked Up[/i] – When Yune enters, put four stun counter on her.
[i]Break the Seal[/i] – Whenever the last stun counter is removed from Yune, sacrifice her. If you do, search your library for a God or Demigod card, reveal it and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library if you searched this way.
